item.title: Cyber Security for Beginners
item.description: Cyber Security for Beginners: Your Ultimate Guide Cyber security can seem daunting with the vast amount of information available. As a beginner, it can be challenging to know where to start. In this guide, we’ll cover the three most important areas of cyber security. Stick around to the end for some free resources to help you dive deeper. What is Cyber Security? A simple way to describe cyber security is protecting people and their computers from bad actors and their malicious activities.
